channel.title: Blog on Nasir Nesirli
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Nasir Nesirli

item.title: Building in Public: Starting Quanta From Zero
item.description: I'm building Quanta, a clinical laboratory ERP, and I'm going to document the entire journey publicly. Here's why and what comes next.

item.title: The Problem with Lab Software: Why Clinical Labs Deserve Better
item.description: Clinical laboratories are using software that was designed in the 1990s, and it shows. Here's what's wrong and why it matters for patient care.

item.title: Why I'm Building Quanta: A Clinical Lab ERP That Actually Understands Labs
item.description: After years managing a clinical microbiology lab, I got tired of fighting with software that clearly wasn't built by anyone who'd ever worked in a lab.
